text: Gerhard Weber (3 June 1941 – 24 September 2020) was a German fashion designer and entrepreneur. He founded Gerry Weber, a fashion manufacturer and retailer in Halle, North Rhine-Westphalia. He sponsored sports, especially tennis, and built a stadium named after the company. Weber was born in Halle. Weber died on 24 September 2020 in Münster, Germany at the age of 79.Gerry Weber founder Gerhard Weber dies aged 79 fashionunited.uk 24 September 2020 ==References== Category:German fashion designers Category:German businesspeople Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from North Rhine-Westphalia
title: Gerhard Weber (designer)
